T04sanss13u:4: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvâivaṃ kāye smṛtim upasthāpayati /
T04sanss13u:17: tasya kāyaparijñānahetor na bhūyaḥ kvacit smṛtiḥ prasarati /
T04sanss13u:28: āgantukair vyavahārair vyavahriyate kāyêti dehêti bhogêti āśrayêti śarīram iti kuṇapêti āyatanam iti /
T04sanss13u:32: anityo vatâyaṃ kāyo 'cirasthitiko maraṇaparyavasānêti jñātvā na kāyahetor viṣamayā jīvati /
T04sanss13u:38: so 'nityaḥ kāyêti sarvasatvānāṃ dāsatvaśiṣyatvam abhyupagamya kiṅkaraṇīyatāyai utsuko bhavati /
T04sanss13u:39: anityaḥ kāyêti sarvakāya doṣavaṅkaśāṭhyakuhanāṃ na karoti /
T04sanss13u:40: anityaḥ kāyêti jīvitenâśvāsaprāpto jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti /
T04sanss13u:41: anityaḥ kāyêti bhogeṣu tṛṣṇâdhyavasānaṃ na karoti /
T04sanss13u:43: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ kāye kāyânudarśanasmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan sarvasatvakāyāṃs tatra svakāyae upanibadhnāti /
T04sanss13u:46: yathā ca tathāgatakāye nâśravas tathā svakāyadharmatāṃ pratyavekṣate /
T04sanss13u:47: so nâśravadharmatākuśalaḥ sarvasatvakāyān api tallakṣaṇān eva prajānātîty ādi //
T04sanss13u:49: yad utâyaṃ kāyo 'nupūrvasamudāgato 'nupūrvavināśo paramâṇusaṃcayaḥ śuṣirônnāmâvanāmau navavraṇamukharomakūpasrāvī valmīkavadāsīviṣanivāsaḥ [[DOUBT]]
T04sanss13u:86: prajñāyamānaḥ sa hi bālabuddhiḥ viṣṭhāghaṭaṃ yāti vahan vicetāḥ //
T04sanss13u:93: yāti kṣayaṃ nâiva tu śuklabhāvaṃ bālasya buddhir vitathâbhimānā //
T04sanss13u:94: evaṃ hi yaḥ caukṣamatir manuṣyaḥ caukṣaṃ kariṣye 'ham idaṃ śarīram /
T04sanss13u:95: sûdvartitaṃ tīrthaśatâbhiṣiktaṃ yāti kṣayaṃ mṛtyuvaśād acaukṣam //
T04sanss13u:98: prasravan bodhisatvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyo nava vraṇamukhair yāvat /
T04sanss13u:106: asvâdhīno bodhisatvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ annapānasaṃbhūtêti vistaraḥ //
T04sanss13u:108: vedanā smṛtyupasthānaṃ tu yathā tāvad āryaratnacūḍasūtre /
T04sanss13u:109: iha kulaputra bodhisatvo vedanāsu vedanânupaśyanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan veditasukhâśriteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate /
T04sanss13u:111: tat sukhaṃ yatra veditaṃ nâsti sa sarvasatvaveditaprahāṇāya vedanāsu vedanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayati /
T04sanss13u:116: sa yāṃ kāṃcid vedanāṃ vedayate tāṃ sarvāṃ mahākaruṇāparigṛhītāṃ vedayate /
T04sanss13u:117: sa yadā sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadā rāgacariteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate ātmanaś ca rāgânuśayaṃ pratijahāti /
T04sanss13u:118: yadā duṣkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadā dveṣacariteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate ātmanaś ca doṣânuśayaṃ prajahāti /
T04sanss13u:119: yadâduṣkhâsukhāṃ vedanāṃ mohacariteṣu satyeṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate /
T04sanss13u:128: sa yāṃ kāñcid vedanāṃ vetti sarvāṃ tām anityaveditāṃ vetti /
T04sanss13u:134: iti hi yat sukhaṃ tad anityaṃ yad duṣkhaṃ sukham eva tat /
T04sanss13u:135: yad aduṣkhâsukhaṃ tad anātmakam ity ādi //
T04sanss13u:137: duṣkhayā vedanayā spṛṣṭaḥ sarvapāpâkṣaṇôpapanneṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇām utpādayati //
T04sanss13u:138: pe //api tu khalu punar abhiniveśo vedanā parigraho vedanôpādānaṃ vedanôpalambho vedanā viparyāso vedanā vikalpo vedanêty ādi //
T04sanss13u:142: vedako vedanād anyaḥ pṛthagbhūto na vidyate //
T04sanss13u:144: yathā bodhis tathā hy eṣā śāntā śuddhā prabhāsvarā //
T04sanss13u:149: rajyati vā duṣyati vā muhyati vā /
T04sanss13u:156: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nâdhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nôbhayam antareṇôpalabhyate /
T04sanss13u:157: cittaṃ hi kāśyapârūpam anidarśanam apratigham avijñaptikam apratiṣṭham
T04sanss13u:160: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ /
T04sanss13u:161: na paśyanti na drakṣyanti yat sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ /
T04sanss13u:165: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa māyāsadṛśam abhūtaparikalpanayā vividhām upapattiṃ parigṛhṇāti //pe //
T04sanss13u:166: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nadīsrotaḥsadṛśam anavasthitam utpannabhagnavilīnaṃ /
T04sanss13u:167: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa dīpârcciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate /
T04sanss13u:169: cittaṃ hi kāśyapâkāśasadṛśam āgantukaiḥ kleśair upakliśyate /
T04sanss13u:170: pe //cittaṃ hi kāśyapa pāpamitrasadṛśaṃ sarvaduṣkhasaṃjananatayā / pe /
T04sanss13u:171: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa matsyabaḍiśasadṛśaṃ duṣkhe sukhasaṃjñayā /
T04sanss13u:180: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sparśârāmaṃ makṣikêva tailapātre /
T04sanss13u:181: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate /
T04sanss13u:183: yan nôpalabhyate tan nâivâtītaṃ nânāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ /
T04sanss13u:184: yan nâivâtītaṃ nânāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ tat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ /
T04sanss13u:185: yat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ tan nêvâsti na nâstîty ādi //
T04sanss13u:188: sa cittaṃ parigaveṣamāṇo nâdhyātmaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati /
T04sanss13u:195: tasyâivaṃ bhavati ālambane sati cittam utpadyate /
T04sanss13u:197: atha yad evâlambanaṃ tad eva cittaṃ /
T04sanss13u:198: yadi tāvad anyad ālambanam anyac cittaṃ /
T04sanss13u:200: atha yad evâlambanaṃ tad eva cittaṃ /
T04sanss13u:206: na tenâivâṅguly-agreṇa tad evâṅguly-agraṃ spraṣṭuṃ śakyate /
T04sanss13u:207: nâiva cittena tad eva cittaṃ śakyate draṣṭum //
T04sanss13u:208: pe //punar aparaṃ kulaputra yad upadrutapradrutânavasthitapracārasya vānaramārutasadṛśasya / pe /
T04sanss13u:210: cittasyâvasthānām ekâgratâśaraṇam aviśaraṇaṃ śamathâikâgratâvikṣepêty ucyate cittasya smṛtir iti //
T04sanss13u:218: yat punaḥ sarvasvaṃ parityajya sarvabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye pariṇāmayatîtîyam ucyate viṭhapanêty ādi //
T04sanss13u:221: dharme dharmânudarśī viharan bodhisatvo na kañcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
T04sanss13u:222: yato na buddhadharmā yato na bodhiḥ /
T04sanss13u:223: yato na mārgo yato na niḥsaraṇaṃ /
T04sanss13u:224: sa sarvadharmâniḥsaraṇam iti viditvânāvaraṇaṃ nāma mahākaruṇāsamādhiṃ samāpadyate /
T04sanss13u:225: sa sarvadharmeṣu sarvakleśeṣu ca kṛtrimasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate /
T04sanss13u:232: na rāgabhāvo na dveṣabhāvo na mohabhāva /
T04sanss13u:234: yat svabhāvāś ca kleśās tat svabhāvā bodhir ity evaṃ smṛtim upasthāpayatîti //
T04sanss13u:236: iha kulaputra bodhisatvasya dharme dharmânupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānena viharatâivaṃ bhavati /
T04sanss13u:239: na punar atra kaścid ātmabhāve satvo vā jīvo vā jantur vā poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā yo jāyate vā jīryate vā cyavate vôtpadyate vā /
T04sanss13u:246: yante tādṛśāḥ samudāgacchanti kuśalā vâkuśalā vā
T04sanss13u:250: na câhetukānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kācid utpattir ity ādi //
T04sanss13u:252: sa kiyadgambhīrān api dharmān pratyavekṣamāṇas tāṃ sarvajñatābodhicittânusmṛtiṃ na vijahāti //
T04sanss13u:256: saṃskāra pralopa dharmime varṣakāli calitaṃ vilepanaṃ /
T04sanss13u:263: hetūbhi ca pratyayebhi vā sarva saṃskāragataṃ pravartate /
T04sanss13u:264: anyonyapratītyahetutaḥ tad idaṃ bālajano na budhyate //
T04sanss13u:265: yathā muñja pratītya balbajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā /
T04sanss13u:266: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣv ekâikaśu nâsti vartanā //
T04sanss13u:269: bījasya sato yathâṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa câivâṅkuro /
T04sanss13u:270: na cânya tato na câiva tat /
T04sanss13u:273: saṃskārâvidyapratyayāḥ te ca saṃskāra na santi tatvataḥ /
T04sanss13u:274: saṃskārâvidya câiva hi śūnyâite prakṛtī nirīhakāḥ //
T04sanss13u:275: mudrāt pratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na côpalabhyate /
T04sanss13u:276: na ca tatra na câiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāranucchedaśāśvatāḥ //
T04sanss13u:277: cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpataḥ cakṣu vijñānam ihôpajāyate /
T04sanss13u:278: na ca cakṣuṣi rūpaniśritaṃ rūpasaṃkrānti na câiva cakṣuṣi //
T04sanss13u:279: nairātmyaśubhāś ca dharmime te punar ātmêti śubhāś ca kalpitāḥ /
T04sanss13u:282: akahiñci gatam anāgataṃ śūnya māyôpama yogi paśyati //
T04sanss13u:287: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtukāryu laghū nirudhyate //
T04sanss13u:288: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuta yam āgatu kutra yāti vā /
T04sanss13u:289: vidiśo diśi sarva mārgato na gatir nâpy agatiś ca labhyate //
T04sanss13u:291: sāmagri tu satvasūcanā sā ca paramârthatu nôpalabhyate //
T04sanss13u:292: kaṇṭhâuṣṭha pratītya tālukaṃ jihva parivartir avarti akṣarā /
T04sanss13u:293: na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tālukaiḥ akṣarâikâika tu nôpalabhyate //
T04sanss13u:294: sāmagripratītyaś ca sā vācam anubudhivaśena niścarī /
T04sanss13u:297: kṣaṇikāṃ vaśikāṃ tad īdṛśīṃ sarvavācaḥ pratiśrutakôpamāḥ //
T04sanss13u:299: yatha tantri pratītya dāru ca hastavyāyāmatrayebhi saṃgatim /
T04sanss13u:301: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuto 'yam āgatu kutra yāti vā /
T04sanss13u:302: vidiśo diśa sarvamārgataḥ śabdam anāgamanaṃ na labhyate //
T04sanss13u:303: tatha hetubhi pratyayebhi ca sarvasaṃskāragataṃ pravartate /
T04sanss13u:304: yogī puna bhūtadarśanāt śūnya saṃskāra nirīha paśyati //
T04sanss13u:309: śūnyatā na kvacid devā na nāgā nâpi rākṣasāḥ //
T04sanss13u:310: manuṣyā vâmanuṣyā vā sarve tu eṣa vidyate /
T04sanss13u:311: nāmnā hi nāmatā śūnyā nāmni nāma na vidyate //
T04sanss13u:312: anāmakāḥ sarve dharmāḥ nāmnā tu paridīpitāḥ //
T04sanss13u:313: yo hi svabhāvo nāmno vai na sa dṛṣṭo na ca śrutaḥ /
T04sanss13u:314: na côtpanno niruddho vā kasya nāmêha pṛcchasi //
